title: Home In West Bloomfield Available For Lease
posting_body: IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME
I MAY HAVE OTHER PROPERTIES TO PASS BY YOU
Beautiful Brick ranch house, 3 bedrooms, 1.5 Bathroom, Large Living room with Natural fire place.
updated 2017 kitchen with plenty of cabinets, granite counter tops ,furnace, A/C. Appliances included: Stove, Ref. ,Dishwasher.

spacious dining area first floor laundry room with washer and dryer and storage space enclosed screened Florida room great for spring and summer relaxing and view of huge fenced yard with shed for additional storage.
walking to the park at the end of street park with baseball and basketball courts.$200 non-refundable cleaning fee.
First month rent + 1.5 m Security deposit + proof of income & ID and Credit report requires.

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
The buyer is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.
